contentList.content: You have <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light Armour, Medium Armor and Shields.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="MusicalInstrumentProficiency">Musical Instrument Proficiency</LSTag>, and can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CL_Shout_Doot">magically summon an instrument of your choice</LSTag>.
